content: Maybe we don't need Suye... baa~?
Baa-bleat! You really believe we'd go hungry without commissions?

Finding gems? Sure thing~
Making up stories? Not my thing, baa...
But finding someone to trick? Now that I can do, baa-daa!

What should I prepare, baa...
Those bush leaves I tried last time weren't good for cooking either,
Hmm, need to think this through carefully...

I really want to hear those spooky stories baa~
Suye's mysterious obsession with ghost stories is so intriguing baa-daa~
And Rebella's enthusiasm is just sooo adorable~

If someone calls you a sweetie, you gotta call them back one too~
That's what friends do, baa-daa~
Rebella~

Why don't you believe me, baa~?
Could it be... they have a side job too?

I've never seen them open for business, baa...
How do they even make a living?

Dearest floofy friend~
To my "friend" who didn't eat my paintbrush,
Suye rejected the commission, baa~

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
if you have some free time,
you're welcome to join us, baa~

Dinner was nice, I only had dinner today,
...but I don't want grass,
I want meat-meat, I want meat-meat!

How about we make dinner,
And invite Suye over together, baa~,
I really want to hear some spooky stories~.

What did you just say~?
"Cute~"?
...how long have you been having these symptoms, baa-bhan?
You said Suye won't be able to eat if she doesn't get any commissions... baa-hoo... Should we try to think of another way to help with the commission situation, baa?

Suye only wants to talk about spooky stories,
but still answers other questions too,
how interesting and adorable, baa~

"Big sweetie baa~?"
Did you forget my name, or did you forget my name baa~?
